title: Best of The Herd: 02/11/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 02/11/2019
description:
Colin says Dak Prescott is being ridiculous saying Tom Brady takes payouts because his wife makes a lot of money.  He thinks Kyler Murray going to the NFL will be exciting and sees him as potentially a top ten pick.  He talks about where he was right and wrong in the past week.  Plus, former NBA player Cuttino Mobley talks about the Celtics struggles and why last season may have been their peak.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
